text: Fred Gwynne (born July 10, 1926 - July 2, 1993) was an American actor. He is best known for his role as Herman Munster in The Munsters. He played Francis Muldoon in Car 54, Where Are You?. The Munsters and Car 54, Where Are You? were television situation comedies. He also wrote children's literature. == References == Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Actors from New York City Category:1926 births Category:1993 deaths
title: Fred Gwynne
